text:
Hello.

We are using mod_proxy and mod_ssl on a high volume site and are seeing quite
large memory leaks. The problem does not appear when using process MPM.

The apache process consumes memory until we have to restart it, we now have a
cron job which restarts it every hour.

We are using Linux Fedora Core 3 with the fedora 2.0.52 apache.
creator: torvald.bringsvor@ergo.no

text:
We have had several memory leaks fixed since 2.0.52. Please upgrade to at least
2.0.55 or 2.2.0.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
